title: The Blissful Carrot
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Rotating menu with emphasis on using local and organic whole foods. Variety of beverages include cold-pressed juices, health tonics, elixirs, and smoothies. Eclectic, world-inspired atmosphere.
streetAddress: Rua de Carlos Eugenio, 79A, Goio Fai Kok, Res-do-Chao B, Taipa, Ilhas
